### Phytochemicals
<hr>

Phytochemicals Initial structures for the five phytochemicals: capsaicin (cap), curucmin (cur), epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG), genistein (gen), and resveratrol (res); and those five phytochemicals in a POPC bilayer (512 POPC lipids, 6000 CG waters, and 48 phytochemicals each) simulated for 2 Î¼s.

- [cap-CG.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/cap-CG.gro)
- [cur-CG.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/cur-CG.gro)

- [res-CG.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/res-CG.gro)
- [POPC-cap-2us.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/POPC-cap-2us.gro)
- [POPC-cur-2us.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/POPC-cur-2us.gro)
- [POPC-EGCG-2us.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/POPC-EGCG-2us.gro)
- [POPC-gen-2us.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/POPC-gen-2us.gro)
- [POPC-res-2us.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/POPC-res-2us.gro)

### Docosane physisorption on graphite from heptane
<hr>

System for simulation of preferred physisorption of long-chain alkane (6 beads, representing docosane) from short-chain alkane (2-bead, representing heptane).

- [sams.top](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/sams.top)
- [sams.mdp](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/sams.mdp)
REQUIRES special parameter files!

- [martini_v2.g.itp](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/martini_v2.g.itp)
- [martini_v2.0_solvents.itp](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/martini_v2.0_solvents.itp)
- [martini_v2.g_graphite.itp](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/martini_v2.g_graphite.itp)
- [adsorbant_docosane.itp](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/adsorbant_docosane.itp)

Starting conformation contains 18,000 graphite surface particles (5 layers) GRAP, and in total 600 docosane molecules (DOCO) and 16,200 heptane molecules (OCT).

- [start.gro](https://cgmartini-library.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/1_Downloads/example_applications/other_systems/start.gro)
